newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Guess started by Merrill.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Guess started by Merrill.

text.p: -- Merrill Lynch analyst Brenda Gall initiated coverage of Guess Inc with a near-term buy and long-term accumulate rating and said the stock price would appreciate 35 percent over the next 12 months.
-- Her earnings per share estimate for 1996 is $1.27 and $1.54 for 1997.
-- She said Guess was the cheapest stock in apparel, trading at 10.6 times earnings and a more than 40 percent discount to the the S&P.
"Look for strong earnings gains in the second half of this year," she said, adding that EPS growth over the next five years would be 15 to 20 percent.
